name: Bodiverse: Cells United
description:
Bodiverse is a game about the simulation of cells teaming up and trying to protect the body from a virus. The game incorporates use of top down movement to make the white cells follow the player which turns out to the player being able to eliminate all the Viruses from the body. The game makes simple use of shooting and movement to make sure the player has enough challenge and balance the gameplay to make it even more fun!.

Have fun killing all the big ugly viruses in this cute Top Down strategy simulator

Known issue: To end the tutorial JUST in case if you can't figure it out, Just goto the virus and go back to the spawn point where the cells are.

Credits: https://ewhtp4.itch.io/ and https://itch.io/profile/daemon013
